author: charlesb_
content: Maybe it has already been asked, but if we don't achieve the 524,288 ETH goal by December, will nodes just wait indefinitely until the launch threshold is met?

author: djrtwo
content:
The configuration to genesis is client side, so these parameters could be changed (e.g. lower threshold) in the event that the deposits are not hit and the depositing slows rather than accelerates.
But for the time being, we are just watching
